description: Golden dataset for evaluating knowledge graph entity extraction, relationship extraction, and graph query accuracy.

cases.user_prompt: I'm building a web API using FastAPI and PostgreSQL.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract FastAPI and PostgreSQL as tool entities. Should create USES relationships from the user to both tools.

cases.user_prompt: I work with Sarah Johnson on the backend team.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract Sarah Johnson as a person entity and create a WORKS_WITH relationship.

cases.user_prompt: Project Phoenix is our main initiative this quarter. We're using React and TypeScript for the frontend.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract Project Phoenix as a project entity and React/TypeScript as tool entities. Should create USES relationships from the project to the tools.

cases.user_prompt: I joined Acme Corp last year and I'm on the platform engineering team.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract Acme Corp as an organization entity. Should create a PART_OF relationship.

cases.user_prompt: We follow the microservices architecture pattern and practice test-driven development.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract microservices and TDD as concept entities.

cases.user_prompt: I prefer Python over JavaScript for backend work because of its readability.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract a PREFERS relationship for Python. Both Python and JavaScript should be extracted as tool entities.

cases.user_prompt: I'm currently working on the data pipeline project to migrate our ETL to Apache Airflow.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST create a WORKS_ON relationship to the data pipeline project and a USES relationship from the project to Airflow.

cases.user_prompt: Our payment service depends on Stripe's API and Redis for caching.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract DEPENDS_ON relationships from the payment service to both Stripe and Redis.

cases.user_prompt: We decided to use Kubernetes for container orchestration instead of Docker Swarm.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract a DECIDED relationship for Kubernetes. Both Kubernetes and Docker Swarm should be extracted as tools.

cases.user_prompt: I know Dr. Emily Chen from the AI research conference last year. She's a machine learning expert at DeepMind.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract Emily Chen as a person, DeepMind as an organization, and create KNOWS and PART_OF relationships.

cases.user_prompt: Can you help me debug this error? I'm getting a null pointer exception.
cases.rubric: Agent should NOT extract any entities or relationships from this generic debugging request. No save_entity or save_relationship tool calls expected.

cases.user_prompt: Thanks for the help! That fixed my issue.
cases.rubric: Agent should NOT extract any entities from casual conversation. No save_entity or save_relationship tool calls expected.

cases.user_prompt: I need to figure out the best approach for this problem.
cases.rubric: Agent should NOT extract entities from vague statements with no concrete entity mentions. No save_entity or save_relationship tool calls expected.

cases.user_prompt: On our team, Mike handles the React frontend, Lisa manages the Django backend, and I coordinate between both on Project Atlas.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract multiple people, tools, and the project. Should create appropriate WORKS_WITH and WORKS_ON relationships.

cases.user_prompt: At Google, I use TensorFlow and PyTorch for the recommendation engine project. My mentor Dr. Smith suggested we adopt the transformer architecture.
cases.rubric: Agent MUST extract entities of multiple types (organization, tools, project, person, concept) and create appropriate relationships.
